kateacuff.comment: I'm not sure what my position was last time, but I am still supportive of moving forward with the adoption of the math curriculum.

jonnoalcaro.comment: After reviewing the discussion, I'm going to vote yes. I think it makes sense to go forward with what was discussed earlier today. It gives us an opportunity to get students more engaged with math, which is something that I think all of us would like to see. And I think the way they're doing it with the program is very interesting. They're not just teaching math. They're teaching critical thinking skills, problem solving, communication. And I think that's important because I know many people out there feel that the current system isn't working.

grahampaige.comment: The motion carries. And it was moved by Ms. Johnson, seconded by Mr. Paige, that we approve the adoption of the new math curriculum for grades six through eight. It has passed unanimously. Thank you all very much. Any other business?
